name: Blind the Thief (Autoghost)
author: ywkls
info: A rough copy of the behavior exhibited by Blind the Thief in A Link to the Past.
description: Creates a core monster that as it's health drops, spawns heads that circle the body and fire at you. While the head is spawning, it is temporarily invulnerable.Update : 6-6-15- Updated graphics of enemy. Sprites courtesy of BruceJuice.Update: 6-8-16- Updated enemy firing pattern. Heads now leave a trail of fire as they rotate.Update: 6-28-15- Now supports Autoghost!Update: 8-16-15- Added explosive death animaiion. Changed behavior of fire trails slightly. Adjusted enemy hitbox.
setup: Set up 2 enemies. The main boss, 4 x 2. The heads, 1 x 1.Create two combos- Main boss when moving around. Collapsed form.Requires:std.zhstdExtra.zhffcscript.zhstring.zhMust have latest version of ghost.zh, customized to your quest!
